data.text:
―Several days after Summer Training camp started. So far it was 
going well. You could almost say it was going TOO well.

What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
What's wrong, Boss!? I can still keep goin'! 
How 'bout startin' the next part of the menu!?
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
I was amazed by Inari One's tenacity. But still, she was probably 
overworking herself. It was probably time to take a breather.

……Oh, I get it! There's a festival and fireworks startin' soon 
after all! Hehee, it really gets the Edo blood pumpin'!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
If she went with her friends, it would probably be a good change 
of pace. Inari One seemed convinced so I was a little relieved.

Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
should have some free time too, right, Boss?
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: I still have a little more to do……
I still have a little more to do……

data.text:
Hm? Boss, ya still have more work to do? If my trainin's over, ya 
should have some free time too, right, Boss?
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: I still have a little more to do……
I still have a little more to do……

data.text:
Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
ya Boss, so I turned down the others!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Hmmmmm? ……that's a little troublin'. I was plannin' on goin' with 
ya Boss, so I turned down the others!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Man, not havin' someone to go with, 
it's just a teeny bit lonely, huh……
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Oh, ya will? Hehee, thanks! 
Alright, let's meet up again later tonight!
data.name: Inari One

data.text: See ya!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
I'm sure she still had friends she could have invited……but I 
ended up promising Inari One, and headed back to our lodgings.

(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
I just can't leave ya alone!)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
(Boss, ya almost missed the chance to take a breather again. 
I just can't leave ya alone!)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Hehee, gotta make sure they enjoy it to the fullest!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Oh, oh, aren't things startin' to get lively!? Kuuu～! This is it, 
this heated atmosphere! It gets the blood pumpin'!
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: At a festival, it's all about the stalls!
At a festival, it's all about the stalls!

data.text:
Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Hahaa, alright! Guess we should hit 
up the stalls again! Let's go, Boss!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
With such a cheerful smile on her face, 
it was hard not to smile too.

With her eyes sparkling, Inari One pulled my hand, and we hit 
each and every stall.

Oooh～! The sound of fireworks echoes through my chest! 
Ta～maya～! Or somethin'! They're amazin'!
data.name: Inari One

data.text: How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?
data.name: Inari One

data.text: How is it, Boss?! Can ya hear me!?
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Hahaa! Yellin' at the top of your lungs can feel pretty good, huh!? 
C'mon, together now! Ka～giya～!
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Hehee, just like that!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
But, if Boss was able to relax―)
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Were you able to relax a bit?

data.text:
(……Huu, looks like I was gettin' a little excited too! 
But, if Boss was able to relax―)
data.name: Inari One

choices.text: Were you able to relax a bit?

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
I didn't think she was overworking herself. But, I let her know 
if she pushed too hard, it could happen.

Considering Inari One's personality, she was probably shouldering 
many things. Even now, those things were probably what was 
pushing her forward―

But it's not just pushing her forward, it could also be weighing 
her down. That's why I told her it was fine to relax a little.

W-what are ya sayin'!? Livin' up to others' expectations is what 
Inari-sama is all about! I've already prepared to carry at least―
data.name: Inari One

data.text: W-what's up with that…… like that, it sounds like……
data.name: Inari One

data.text: (I was the one workin' too hard, doesn't it?)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
……Well, that's a little surprisin'. 
You're a really unpredictable person.
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
(Sayin' it like that, guess I never thought 
about it. And on top of that―)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
(For some reason, it feels like somethin' has been lifted off my 
shoulders……like I just relaxed and got in to a hot bath)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
What are ya sayin', ya moron!? ……Do ya think I haven't noticed? 
It's obvious ya had a change of heart.
data.name: Chief

data.text:
If you're an Edo kid from the rough side of town! Go to the big 
stage of the Twinkle Series, stir it up, and make some big waves!!
data.name: Chief

data.text:
(It's true, I was carryin' a lot. The Chief's expectations, and 
not wantin' to disappoint him)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
That's right! If it's for Inari-chan, 
I'll go wherever to cheer her on!!
data.name: Soba-stand Old Lady

data.text:
The Edo Kid, Inari has arrived! 
On that big stage, go knock their socks off!!
data.name: Shopkeeper Old Man

data.text:
(With those people that say they'll go anywhere to cheer me on, 
I need to hold my chest out and run, don't I?)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: (――That's why)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
WaaAAAAAAA!! 
Inari! Inari! Inari! Inari!
data.name: Townsfolk

data.text:
(……maybe it's because I thought it was 
natural to shoulder this 『Alone』)
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
……Hee, guess I can't call myself Inari-sama 
if I'm doin' somethin' so boorish.
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Guess I must've been gettin' too in to it. 
Since Boss had to tell me 『Don't shoulder it alone』.
data.name: Inari One

data.text: I've got you with me, after all.
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Hehee, good job, Boss! 
Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
Hehee, good job, Boss! 
Things could have taken a turn for the worse, huh?
data.name: Inari One

data.text: Oh! Take a look! They're sendin' up a big one!!
data.name: Inari One

data.text:
(If we're shoulderin' this together then, we'll be able to make 
even bigger waves than if I was on my own!)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: (In that case, rather than Tamaya or Kagiya, it should be―)
data.name: Inari One

data.text: 『Waashoi!』, right?!!!!!!
data.name: Inari One
